3M Hi-Strength 90 Spray Adhesive, clear, 24 oz. (709.77 mL)

  • 3M™ Hi-Strength Spray Adhesive 90 is an industrial grade, spray adhesive that is typically used for bonding high pressure laminate (HPL) to wood
